attributes.action: Pay £140 single tier pension to ALL who retire after 2010
attributes.additional_details: The existing pension arrangements introduced in 2010 are unfair and ageist to older workers who, despite having retired since 2010 and having put in their 30 years NI contributions and more, do not have a equal opportunity to benefit from the new proposed £140 per week pension being introduced after 2014.The single tier pension should apply to all who retired after April 2010 who have paid in the required 30 years of contributions.
